projects: [{"title":"Coupled Neurons (Studying Synchrony)","start_date":"Apr 2014","end_date":"Jul 2014","description":"To study synchrony in nature & find the fundamental neural network responsible for the same across simple & complex species. For ex, fireflies flashing, humans clapping hands, drosophila flies beating wings etc. Got some interesting/fascinating results, but couldn’t find the motivation to publish. Realised research requires a lot more patience to truly observe the impact of your work. Didn’t have that back then :)"}]
